Hero.title: Your Digital Partner for Premium Web & App Experiences
Hero.title2: We create digital legacies for ambitious brands

Projects.title: Our Selected Projects
Projects.description: A selection of our recent works built for global markets.
Projects.card_description1: A digital platform for the auto parts market: customers submit requests and receive offers from sellers, while businesses gain a stream of targeted leads. A web system, store catalog with filters, and two mobile applications.
Projects.card_description2: Website of an international real estate agency focused on investment, purchase, and rental of properties worldwide. Emphasis on property presentation and brand trust.
Projects.card_description3: A presentation website for a premium cottage residential complex with a focus on architecture, infrastructure, and a high quality of life.
Projects.card_description4: Corporate website of a real estate agency in Bishkek with a property catalog, filtering, and service presentation.
Projects.card_description5: Informational website of a Swiss organization engaged in social and labor integration of migrants, presenting its programs and activities.
Projects.card_description6: E-commerce platform for premium children's products with subscription-based regular delivery, personal account, and loyalty bonus system.
Projects.card_description7: Online store for a flower salon with online ordering of bouquets, gifts, and delivery services.
Projects.card_description8: Brand image website for No Homme — an exclusive club/venue with a premium atmosphere and membership privileges, focused on style, community, and lifestyle. The site presents the club concept and contact information for members and guests.
Projects.card_description9: Corporate website of a VIP limousine service in Chicago with a fleet overview, service descriptions, and online trip booking.
Projects.card_description10: Website of a beauty salon in Dubai with presentation of services, specialists, and a visual portfolio of work.
Projects.card_description11: Website of a rehabilitation medical center with service descriptions, specialists, and online appointment booking.
Projects.card_description12: Website of a private emergency medical service with a list of emergency, on-site, and transportation services.
Projects.card_description13: Website of a private school presenting educational programs, learning advantages, and admission conditions.
Projects.card_description14: Information portal of the Association of the Garment Industry of Kyrgyzstan with a company catalog and industry news.
Projects.card_description15: Website of an international non-profit organization describing social projects, partnerships, and news.
Projects.card_description16: Promotional website for a feature film with a trailer, gallery, and multilingual content presentation.
Projects.card_description17: Corporate website of an industrial plant producing grinding balls for the mining industry.
Projects.card_description18: Website of a manufacturing company in the metallurgical products sector with a presentation of technologies and production.
Projects.card_description19: International corporate website of a holding company operating in trade, investment, and industrial sectors.
Projects.card_description20: Temir — a smart NFC business card platform for instant contact sharing and digital profiles.
Projects.card_description21: Corporate website of a service company specializing in relocations and furniture cleaning, with service descriptions and a request form.
Projects.card_description22: Landing page for a cleaning company with an online request form for residential and commercial cleaning services.

What.title: What We Do
What.description: Full-cycle digital production for your business.
What.web_description: Custom, high-performance websites designed to convert.
What.mobile_description: iOS & Android apps with intuitive UI/UX.

About.title: About Our Studio
About.description: We are a digital studio specializing in web and mobile development, UX/UI design, and digital marketing.
About.video_description: Our approach combines aesthetics, technology, and strategy.
About.video_description2: Operations in UAE, Switzerland, USA, Kyrgyzstan & more.

Slider.description: “Thank you to the team for the amazing website! Everything was done carefully, thoughtfully, and exactly how we envisioned it. A pleasure to work with.”
